verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <S%H7892><s%> A Song מִזְמ֗וֹר <S%H4210><s%> [or] Psalm לִבְנֵ֫י <S%H1121><s%> for the sons קֹ֥רַח <S%H7141><s%> of Korah לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ <S%H5329><s%> to the chief Musician עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon מָחֲלַ֣ת <S%H4257><s%> upon Mahalath לְעַנּ֑וֹת <S%H6031><s%> Leannoth מַ֝שְׂכִּ֗יל <S%H4905><s%> Maschil לְהֵימָ֥ן <S%H1968><s%> of Heman הָאֶזְרָחִֽי׃ <S%H250><s%> the Ezrahite יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יְשׁוּעָתִ֑י <S%H3444><s%> of my salvation יוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> day צָעַ֖קְתִּי <S%H6817><s%> I have cried בַלַּ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> [and] night נֶגְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5048><s%> before

תָּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> come לְ֭פָנֶיךָ <S%H6440><s%> before תְּפִלָּתִ֑י <S%H8605><s%> Let my prayer הַטֵּֽה־ <S%H5186><s%> thee incline אָ֝זְנְךָ֗ <S%H241><s%> thine ear לְרִנָּתִֽי׃ <S%H7440><s%> unto my cry

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שָֽׂבְעָ֣ה <S%H7646><s%> is full בְרָע֣וֹת <S%H7451><s%> of troubles נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> For my soul וְחַיַּ֗י <S%H2416><s%> and my life לִשְׁא֥וֹל <S%H7585><s%> unto the grave הִגִּֽיעוּ׃ <S%H5060><s%> draweth nigh

נֶ֭חְשַׁבְתִּי <S%H2803><s%> I am counted עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> among י֣וֹרְדֵי <S%H3381><s%> with them that go down ב֑וֹר <S%H953><s%> into the pit הָ֝יִ֗יתִי <S%H1961><s%> have כְּגֶ֣בֶר <S%H1397><s%> I am as a man אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> without אֱיָֽל׃ <S%H353><s%> [that hath] no strength

בַּמֵּתִ֗ים <S%H4191><s%> among the dead חָ֫פְשִׁ֥י <S%H2670><s%> Free כְּמ֤וֹ <S%H3644><s%> Like חֲלָלִ֨ים ׀ <S%H2491><s%> like the slain שֹׁ֥כְבֵי <S%H7901><s%> that lie קֶ֗בֶר <S%H6913><s%> in the grave אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> Whom לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no זְכַרְתָּ֣ם <S%H2142><s%> whom thou rememberest ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> more וְ֝הֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> from מִיָּדְךָ֥ <S%H3027><s%> from thy hand נִגְזָֽרוּ׃ <S%H1504><s%> no more and they are cut off
שַׁ֭תַּנִי <S%H7896><s%> Thou hast laid בְּב֣וֹר <S%H953><s%> pit תַּחְתִּיּ֑וֹת <S%H8482><s%> me in the lowest בְּ֝מַחֲשַׁכִּ֗ים <S%H4285><s%> in darkness בִּמְצֹלֽוֹת׃ <S%H4688><s%> in the deeps

עָ֭לַי <S%H5921><s%> and סָמְכָ֣ה <S%H5564><s%> lieth hard חֲמָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H2534><s%> Thy wrath וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִ֝שְׁבָּרֶ֗יךָ <S%H4867><s%> [me] with all thy waves עִנִּ֥יתָ <S%H6031><s%> upon me and thou hast afflicted סֶּֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

הִרְחַ֥קְתָּ <S%H7368><s%> far מְיֻדָּעַ֗י <S%H3045><s%> mine acquaintance מִ֫מֶּ֥נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at שַׁתַּ֣נִי <S%H7896><s%> from me thou hast made תוֹעֵב֣וֹת <S%H8441><s%> me an abomination לָ֑מוֹ כָּ֝לֻ֗א <S%H3607><s%> unto them [I am] shut up וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and cannot אֵצֵֽא׃ <S%H3318><s%> and I cannot come forth

עֵינִ֥י <S%H5869><s%> Mine eye דָאֲבָ֗ה <S%H1669><s%> mourneth מִנִּ֫י <S%H4480><s%> because עֹ֥נִי <S%H6040><s%> by reason of affliction קְרָאתִ֣יךָ <S%H7121><s%> I have called יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every י֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> daily שִׁטַּ֖חְתִּי <S%H7849><s%> upon thee I have stretched out אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> out כַפָּֽי׃ <S%H3709><s%> my hands

הֲלַמֵּתִ֥ים <S%H4191><s%> to the dead תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> Wilt thou shew פֶּ֑לֶא <S%H6382><s%> wonders אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo רְ֝פָאִ֗ים <S%H7496><s%> ? shall the dead יָק֤וּמוּ ׀ <S%H6965><s%> arise יוֹד֬וּךָ <S%H3034><s%> [and] praise סֶּֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> thee? Selah

הַיְסֻפַּ֣ר <S%H5608><s%> be declared בַּקֶּ֣בֶר <S%H6913><s%> the grave חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H2617><s%> Shall thy lovingkindness אֱ֝מֽוּנָתְךָ֗ <S%H530><s%> your faithfulness בָּאֲבַדּֽוֹן׃ <S%H11><s%> destruction

הֲיִוָּדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> be known בַּחֹ֣שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> dark פִּלְאֶ֑ךָ <S%H6382><s%> Shall thy wonders וְ֝צִדְקָתְךָ֗ <S%H6666><s%> justice בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land נְשִׁיָּֽה׃ <S%H5388><s%> forgetfulness

וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <S%H589><s%> I אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> about יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD שִׁוַּ֑עְתִּי <S%H7768><s%> But unto thee have I cried וּ֝בַבֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> and in the morning תְּֽפִלָּתִ֥י <S%H8605><s%> shall my prayer תְקַדְּמֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H6923><s%> prevent

לָמָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> why יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> LORD תִּזְנַ֣ח <S%H2186><s%> why castest thou off נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> any תַּסְתִּ֖יר <S%H5641><s%> be absent פָּנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thou thy face מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

עָ֘נִ֤י <S%H6041><s%> I [am] afflicted אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I וְגֹוֵ֣עַ <S%H1478><s%> and ready to die מִנֹּ֑עַר <S%H5290><s%> from [my] youth נָשָׂ֖אתִי <S%H5375><s%> up [while] I suffer אֵמֶ֣יךָ <S%H367><s%> thy terrors אָפֽוּנָה׃ <S%H6323><s%> I am distracted
עָ֭לַי <S%H5921><s%> over עָבְר֣וּ <S%H5674><s%> goeth over חֲרוֹנֶ֑יךָ <S%H2740><s%> Thy fierce wrath בִּ֝עוּתֶ֗יךָ <S%H1161><s%> me thy terrors צִמְּתוּתֻֽנִי׃ <S%H6789><s%> have cut me off

סַבּ֣וּנִי <S%H5437><s%> They came round about כַ֭מַּיִם <S%H4325><s%> like water כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> me daily הִקִּ֖יפוּ <S%H5362><s%> they compassed עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> and יָֽחַד׃ <S%H3162><s%> me about together

הִרְחַ֣קְתָּ <S%H7368><s%> hast thou put far מִ֭מֶּנִּי <S%H4480><s%> at אֹהֵ֣ב <S%H157><s%> Lover וָרֵ֑עַ <S%H7453><s%> and friend מְֽיֻדָּעַ֥י <S%H3045><s%> from me [and] mine acquaintance מַחְשָֽׁךְ׃ <S%H4285><s%> into darkness
